com.dukascopy.api.indicators

Interface IIndicatorContext


  • public interface IIndicatorContext
    Provides access to system services

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAccount getAccount()
      Provides access to various account information
      IConsole getConsole()
      Returns interface that allows to write messages into the Messages table
      IDataService getDataService()
      Provides access to IDataService
      IFeedDescriptor getFeedDescriptor() 
      java.io.File getFilesDir()
      Returns directory where reading and writing is allowed.
      IHistory getHistory()
      Provides access to history from indicators
      IIndicatorChartPanel getIndicatorChartPanel()
      Provides access to IIndicatorChartPanel
      IIndicatorsProvider getIndicatorsProvider()
      Returns interface that can be used to get indicators registered in the system
      Instrument getInstrument()
      Deprecated. 
      Use getFeedDescriptor().getInstrument() instead
      OfferSide getOfferSide()
      Deprecated. 
      Use getFeedDescriptor().getOfferSide() instead
      Period getPeriod()
      Deprecated. 
      Use getFeedDescriptor().getPeriod() instead
      boolean isLive()
      Returns true when indicator is used on Live account, false otherwise

      • getInstrument

        Instrument getInstrument()
        Deprecated. Use getFeedDescriptor().getInstrument() instead
        Returns instrument of the primary input when called from IIndicator.calculate(int, int) or IIndicator.setInputParameter(int, java.lang.Object) methods
        Returns:
        instrument of the primary input

      • getPeriod

        Period getPeriod()
        Deprecated. Use getFeedDescriptor().getPeriod() instead
        Returns period of the primary input when called from IIndicator.calculate(int, int) or IIndicator.setInputParameter(int, java.lang.Object) methods
        Returns:
        period of the primary input

      • getOfferSide

        OfferSide getOfferSide()
        Deprecated. Use getFeedDescriptor().getOfferSide() instead
        Returns offer side of the primary input when called from IIndicator.calculate(int, int) or IIndicator.setInputParameter(int, java.lang.Object) methods
        Returns:
        offer side of the primary input

      • getFilesDir

        java.io.File getFilesDir()
        Returns directory where reading and writing is allowed. Usually ~/My Documents/My Strategies/files
        Returns:
        directory with free read/write access
